original: Kusalaṁ maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: ▁kusalaṃ ▁magg ārammaṇaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na kusal o ▁na magg ārammaṇ o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ ▁hetuyā ▁cha ▁ adhipatiyā ▁cha ▁pe ▁avigate ▁cha

original: Kusalaṁ maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁kusalaṃ ▁magg ahetu kaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na kusal o ▁na magg ahetu ko ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ ▁hetuyā ▁tīṇi ▁ adhipatiyā ▁tīṇi ▁pe ▁avigate ▁tīṇi

original: Kusalaṁ maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: ▁kusalaṃ ▁magg ādhipati ṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na kusal o ▁na magg ādhipati ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ ▁hetuyā ▁cha ▁ adhipatiyā ▁cha ▁pe ▁avigate ▁cha
